articles.description: All the latest coronavirus news and updates on lockdown, testing, cases and latest death toll numbers from Hull and around the world
articles.content:
Over 3 million people in the UK have been tested for coronavirus.
The Department of Health said 36,042 people had died in hospitals, care homes and the wider community after testing positive for cor… [+1287 chars]
